The Xenoforce as entered the base guided by Pegatron.
Pegatron:So that's the base I...
Then he saw Nightstrike taking Alpha in hostage.
Pegatron:What?Leave her alone damn bastard!If you want a fight come 
and get me!
And he take out his saber katana.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon/Skyburst::
> 
> They both were ready to attack, but could not fire on Nighstrike 
without
> harming Alpha.
> "Get away from her!" Yelled Epyon.
